speaker: /home/prakharrrr4/wolfy_ui/wolf/media/data/audio_data/ivan_ted.wav
speech: The true fear isn't in facing the challenges; it's in never reaching your potential.  It's the horror of looking back on your life, filled with the 'what ifs,' the 'could haves.'
asr_speech: The true fear isn't in facing the challenges. It's in never reaching your potential. It's the horror of looking back on your life, filled with the what-ifs the could-have-s.
